VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Athleisure?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Athleisure is arc {Streetwear}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Sustainable Fashion?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Sustainable Fashion is arc {Streetwear}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Sustainable Fashion} has the largest input flow.

VE.Q: What is the flow value from Sustainable Fashion to Streetwear in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Streetwear to Athleisure in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Sustainable Fashion to Athleisure in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Sustainable Fashion and Athleisure in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Sustainable Fashion and Athleisure is {1052}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Athleisure and Sustainable Fashion in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Athleisure and Sustainable Fashion is {554}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Athleisure?
SC.A: The total flow output from Athleisure is {747}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Sustainable Fashion?
SC.A: The total flow input by Sustainable Fashion is {1859}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 1061? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {1071} from {Sustainable Fashion} to {Streetwear}, a flow of {1305} from {Streetwear} to {Sustainable Fashion}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 542? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {193} from {Athleisure} to {Streetwear}, a flow of {530} from {Streetwear} to {Athleisure}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 361 and 1061? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {530} from {Streetwear} to {Athleisure}, a flow of {1052} from {Sustainable Fashion} to {Athleisure}, a flow of {554} from {Athleisure} to {Sustainable Fashion}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Sustainable Fashion to Streetwear or from Streetwear to Sustainable Fashion?
NC.A: The flow from {Streetwear} to {Sustainable Fashion} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Sustainable Fashion to Athleisure, from Athleisure to Streetwear, or from Sustainable Fashion to Streetwear?
NC.A: The flow from {Sustainable Fashion} to {Streetwear} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Streetwear}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Streetwear} and {Sustainable Fashion}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Streetwear, Arc Sustainable Fashion, Arc Athleisure}.
